vote.title: Authorize acquisition of a wastewater easement from Alessandro Attura, of approximately 4,410 square feet of land located near the intersection of Harbor Town Drive and Hilton Head Drive in Dallas/Collin County for the Bent Tree Interceptor Project - Not to exceed $72,058.00 ($69,058.00, plus closing costs and title expenses not to exceed $3,000.00) - Financing: Wastewater Construction Fund
